scripts.start: pnpm run cds && npx expo start -c --dev-client
scripts.local-dev-a-s: APP_VARIANT=development pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform android --profile  staging --local && pnpm run a
scripts.local-dev-i-s: APP_VARIANT=development pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform ios --non-interactive --profile  staging --local && pnpm run a
scripts.device-i: pnpm run cds && npx expo run:ios --device
scripts.device-a: pnpm run cds && npx expo run:android --device
scripts.tunnel: pnpm run cds && npx expo start -c --dev-client --tunnel
scripts.update-development: pnpm run cds && pnpm run incrementUpdateVersion && eas update --branch development && npx sentry-expo-upload-sourcemaps dist
scripts.update-staging: pnpm run cds && pnpm run incrementUpdateVersion && eas update --branch staging && npx sentry-expo-upload-sourcemaps dist
scripts.update-prod: pnpm run cds && pnpm run incrementUpdateVersion && eas update --branch production && npx sentry-expo-upload-sourcemaps dist
scripts.local-dev-i-d: APP_VARIANT=development pnpm run cds  && pnpm run r && eas build --platform ios --profile development --local && pnpm run a
scripts.local-dev-i-p: APP_VARIANT=production pnpm run cds  && pnpm run r && eas build --platform ios --profile production --local && pnpm run a
scripts.local-dev-a-d: APP_VARIANT=development pnpm run cds  && pnpm run r && eas build --platform android --profile  development --local && pnpm run a
scripts.local-dev-a-p: APP_VARIANT=production pnpm run cds  && pnpm run r && eas build --platform android --profile  production --local && pnpm run a
scripts.cloud-dev-i-d: pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform ios --profile development && pnpm run a
scripts.cloud-dev-a-d: pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform android --profile development && pnpm run a
scripts.cloud-dev-i-s: pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform ios --profile staging && pnpm run a
scripts.cloud-dev-a-s: yarn cds && yarn r && eas build --platform android --profile staging && yarn a
scripts.cloud-dev-i-p: pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform ios --profile production && pnpm run a
scripts.cloud-dev-a-p: pnpm run cds && pnpm run r && eas build --platform android --profile production && pnpm run a
scripts.deploy-i: pnpm run cloud-prod-i-p && eas submit --platform ios --latest
scripts.deploy-a: pnpm run cloud-prod-a-p && eas submit --platform android --latest
